br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.interfaces
Interface IResourceAgent

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IInterpreter, IPerson, IRuleInterpreter
All Known Implementing Classes:
Actuator, Aggregator, Interpreter, Person, PersonStub, ResourceAgent, ResourceAgentStub, ResourceDiscovery, ResourceDiscoveryStub, ResourceLocation, ResourceRegister, ResourceRegisterStub, ResourceRepositoryStub, RuleInterpreter, RuleInterpreterStub, SmartObject
public interface IResourceAgent
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface contains ResourceAgent Agent methods

ResourceAgent represents smart modules that comprehends communications and contextual functionalities
